TopicTitle: Calculating phase angles when landing back at Kerbal Space Center (video)

Articles.Content:
Here's a video explaining how to calculate the consistent landings back at Kerbal Space Center using exponential functions

http://youtu.be/Y5b0oZYStKg

You know... I bet I could reverse engineer the entire equation using a simultaneous nonlinear substitution.

I'll have to try it and see.

Best,

-Slashy
